name: Caecus (LadyMarina)
description:
Game made in 32 hours for {Not Only Games Jam} from King.

It made us win the GameJam in first place.

Game shows how blind people see. It is a unique experience. How sound is so important to them and makes you feel the fear and the anxiety that they live. Unique playability and mechanics.

Team (TreePot Games):

- Marina Chavarria: ladymarina.itch.io/

- Júlia Blasco: itch.io/profile/julcy

- Pol Serra: imnotserra.itch.io
